statements: DELETE FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE drill_depth > 1000 AND drill_temperature < 150.5
DELETE FROM seismic_surveys WHERE survey_name = 'Survey A';
DELETE FROM drilling_results WHERE id = 10 AND depth > 1000;
DELETE FROM seismic_surveys WHERE survey_date = '2022-08-15' AND location = 'North Sea';
DELETE FROM seismic_surveys WHERE location = 'North Sea';
DELETE FROM fault_lines WHERE location = 'San Andreas Fault';
DELETE FROM drilling_results WHERE well_id = 1 AND depth < 1000;
DELETE FROM well_locations WHERE latitude > -30.0 AND longitude < 100.0;
